summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of 21st AVENUE SOUTHWEST from Southwest Alaska Street to approximately 600 feet northerly thereof and from approximately 600 feet southerly of Southwest Genesee Street to Southwest Genesee Street; and certain other streets, avenues and easements, by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6658, and appropriating money from the Municipal Sewerage 1971 Construction Fund in aid thereof as a loan.
